status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
*Assessment*

_Eucalyptus Version_
{{4.4.0-0.25788.147.20170202git6e5a63d.el7}}

While verifying EUCA-12956, it was noticed that one of the storage services went into NOTREADY state:
{code}
[root@h-04 ~]# euserv-describe-services --region euca-admin@
SERVICE  autoscaling          API_10.111.1.190  API_10.111.1.190.autoscaling     enabled
SERVICE  autoscalingbackend   eucalyptus        10.111.5.4                       enabled
SERVICE  bootstrap            bootstrap         10.111.5.4                       enabled
SERVICE  cloudformation       API_10.111.1.190  API_10.111.1.190.cloudformation  enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatch           API_10.111.1.190  API_10.111.1.190.cloudwatch      enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatchbackend    eucalyptus        10.111.5.4                       enabled
SERVICE  cluster              black-dollar      black-dollar-cc-0                enabled
SERVICE  cluster              black-market      black-market-cc-0                enabled
SERVICE  cluster              port-of-miami     port-of-miami-cc-0               enabled
SERVICE  compute              API_10.111.1.190  API_10.111.1.190.compute         enabled
SERVICE  dns                  API_10.111.1.190  API_10.111.1.190.dns             enabled
SERVICE  euare                API_10.111.1.190  API_10.111.1.190.euare           enabled
SERVICE  eucalyptus           eucalyptus        10.111.5.4                       enabled
SERVICE  identity             API_10.111.1.190  API_10.111.1.190.identity        enabled
SERVICE  imaging              API_10.111.1.190  API_10.111.1.190.imaging         enabled
SERVICE  imagingbackend       eucalyptus        10.111.5.4                       enabled
SERVICE  loadbalancing        API_10.111.1.190  API_10.111.1.190.loadbalancing   enabled
SERVICE  notifications        eucalyptus        10.111.5.4                       enabled
SERVICE  objectstorage        API_10.111.1.190  API_10.111.1.190.objectstorage   enabled
SERVICE  pollednotifications  eucalyptus        10.111.5.4                       enabled
SERVICE  reporting            bootstrap         10.111.5.4                       enabled
SERVICE  simpleworkflow       API_10.111.1.190  API_10.111.1.190.simpleworkflow  enabled
SERVICE  storage              black-dollar      black-dollar-sc-0                enabled
SERVICE  storage              black-market      black-market-sc-0                enabled
SERVICE  storage              port-of-miami     port-of-miami-sc-0               notready
SERVICE  tokens               API_10.111.1.190  API_10.111.1.190.tokens          enabled
SERVICE  user-api             API_10.111.1.190  API_10.111.1.190                 enabled
{code}
Looking at the {{/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-output.log}} file, looks like "Cleanup RBD" was being called in a loop:
{code}
[root@e-03 ~]# grep "Cleanup RBD" /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-output.log | wc -l
27458
{code}
This was also seen in the logs as well for the {{eucalyptus-cloud.service}}:
{code}
[root@e-03 ~]# systemctl status eucalyptus-cloud.service
‚óè eucalyptus-cloud.service - Eucalyptus cloud web services
   Loaded: loaded (/usr/lib/systemd/system/eucalyptus-cloud.service; enabled; vendor preset: disabled)
   Active: failed (Result: exit-code) since Sun 2017-02-12 23:25:06 PST; 2 days ago
 Main PID: 13690 (code=exited, status=1/FAILURE)

Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 9: (()+0x5bd2) [0x7f245e761bd2]
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 10: (Java_com_sun_jna_Native_invokeInt()+0x22) [0x7f245e764432]
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 11: [0x7f251d16e496]
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: NOTE: a copy of the executable, or `objdump -rdS <executable>` is needed to interpret this.
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: terminate called after throwing an instance of 'ceph::FailedAssertion'
Feb 12 23:25:06 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: Service did not exit cleanly.: No such file or directory
Feb 12 23:25:06 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 2017-02-12 23:25:06 13690 ERROR 0601 Service did not exit cleanly: exit value=6.
Feb 12 23:25:06 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com systemd[1]: eucalyptus-cloud.service: main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE
Feb 12 23:25:06 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com systemd[1]: Unit eucalyptus-cloud.service entered failed state.
Feb 12 23:25:06 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com systemd[1]: eucalyptus-cloud.service failed.

[root@e-03 ~]# journalctl -u eucalyptus-cloud.service
...
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: common/ceph_crypto.cc: In function 'void ceph::crypto::init(CephContext*)' thread 7f2458d5c700 time 2017-02-1
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: common/ceph_crypto.cc: 73: FAILED assert(crypto_context != __null)
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: ceph version 0.94.9 (fe6d859066244b97b24f09d46552afc2071e6f90)
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 1: (()+0x13f195) [0x7f2459ce8195]
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 2: (()+0x18f343) [0x7f2459d38343]
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 3: (()+0x159c49) [0x7f2459d02c49]
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 4: (()+0x156f70) [0x7f2459cfff70]
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 5: (()+0x82d92) [0x7f2459c2bd92]
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 6: (rados_connect()+0x1c) [0x7f2459bfdb3c]
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 7: (ffi_call_unix64()+0x4c) [0x7f245e76e050]
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 8: (ffi_call()+0x1ff) [0x7f245e76dbaf]
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 9: (()+0x5bd2) [0x7f245e761bd2]
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 10: (Java_com_sun_jna_Native_invokeInt()+0x22) [0x7f245e764432]
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 11: [0x7f251d16e496]
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: NOTE: a copy of the executable, or `objdump -rdS <executable>` is needed to interpret this.
Feb 12 23:25:05 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: terminate called after throwing an instance of 'ceph::FailedAssertion'
Feb 12 23:25:06 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: Service did not exit cleanly.: No such file or directory
Feb 12 23:25:06 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[13690]: 2017-02-12 23:25:06 13690 ERROR 0601 Service did not exit cleanly: exit value=6.
Feb 12 23:25:06 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com systemd[1]: eucalyptus-cloud.service: main process exited, code=exited, status=1/FAILURE
Feb 12 23:25:06 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com systemd[1]: Unit eucalyptus-cloud.service entered failed state.
Feb 12 23:25:06 e-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com systemd[1]: eucalyptus-cloud.service failed.
{code}

*Workaround*

To get the storage service back in the 'enabled' state, I had to restart {{eucalyptus-cloud.service}}.

*Steps*

# Set up Eucalyptus VPC cloud with multiple AZs
# Use linked {{cfn-elb-multiaz-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json}} template to create stack
# Curl against the ELB DNS URL using a while loop - for example:
{code}
$ while true; do curl -I http://EUCA12846-NginxELB-TSBYRXYZQS7K6-000727120439.lb.e-32.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com; sleep 1; done >> EUCA12956-curl-test.txt
{code}
# Allocate EIPs, then change the EIP for each ELB instance in each zone

*Additional Notes*

Not sure if the steps above caused this issue, however these are the steps I used when verifying EUCA-12956.
fields.summary: Storage service goes into NOTREADY state due to looping "Cleanup RBD" calls

comments.body: The crash is the same as that in EUCA-13199.  We should also definitely stop logging all these "Cleanup RBD images" messages at INFO level.
[~lincoln.thomas], please, create a new ticket about log message at INFO level.
